mainText:
Steve Jobs is an amazing innovator and entrepreneur whose legacy has not
only inspired me, but countless others throughout the world.  His
contribution to society leaves the stepping stones for tomorrow's future
leaders and creators to live up to.  He is a risk taker who commands the
utmost respect and honor and for that, he will always be remembered.  Thank
you Steve for your indelible mark that you leave with us.  You will be
sorely missed.
header: A true leader who will be missed but never forgotten
author: Laura
